answers.answer: My doc told me that the honeymoon period was that after the 1st diagnosis that my body would continue to use the insulin that my body had made before my pancreas stopped.  I would get a second opinion if I were you.

question: My grandson age 4 has had type 1 diabetes for 2 1/2 years, last month his pancreas started making insulin again after he had the flu.  His doctor said it was the honeymoon period.  How long can a honeymoon period last?
title: honeymoon period
